title: Zombie Elf
summaries: Zombie Elves are Hardmode, post-Plantera enemies, and are the basic, fighter-type enemies that spawn during the Frost Moon event. Despite being relatively easy to hold off, they still do plenty of damage.
Defeating a Zombie Elf adds 1 point (<linked>2 points</linked>) during the Frost Moon event.
